MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW1 postcode area of Crewe, affecting properties in Underwood Lane, Brooklands Grove and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs required to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:06PM on 3rd November 2020.
